mapper.update:
update clip
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thumb = #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
types = #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdTime = #{createdTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},

clipSize = #{clipSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where clipId = #{clipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update clip set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumb = #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, types = #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdTime = #{createdTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aliKey = #{aliKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dpi = #{dpi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trimIn = #{trimIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trimOut = #{trimOut,jdbcType=INTEGER}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shootTime = #{shootTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clipSize = #{clipSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} where clipId = #{clipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM clip WHERE aliKey = #{aliKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 1
SELECT c.length AS length FROM clip c WHERE c.clipId = #{clipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE c FROM clip c, cliprefrence cf WHERE cf.clipId = c.clipId AND cf.scriptId = #{scriptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
